name: Dice Ventures
description:
As a brave unnamed knight, you venture forth into a world inspired by board games, in order to defeat the evil GM (Goose Mother) and escape the ever-looping board!

As you progress, you have the option to loop around the map in order to increase the difficulty of battles, but also rewards, and when you feel ready, challenge the GM in combat!

How to play:

  • Click on the area next to the player character to move to that square
  • In battle, click on one of the buttons to choose an action to perform
  • You have to select the target after choosing Attack or Slice 'n' Dice to have the attack go through
  • Certain attacks, leveling up and fleeing from battle costs Dice. You receive dice from events and by winning battles!
  • Defeat the Goose Mother to win!
